Title: The Post
Actors: Meryl Streep, Tom Hanks, Sarah Paulson, Bob Odenkirk
Plot: A cover-up spanning four U.S. Presidents pushes the country's first female newspaper publisher and her editor to join an unprecedented battle between press and government.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 20 wins & 109 nominations.
Production: Participant Media, 20th Century Fox, Amblin Entertainment, DreamWorks Pictures, Star Thrower Entertainment
